${ModID}:PierceVeil.NAME: Pierce Veil
${ModID}:PierceVeil.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Add 1 of !M! top 牌 of your 抽牌堆 加入手牌。

${ModID}:Stall.NAME: Stall
${ModID}:Stall.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Put up to !M! 牌 from your h并on top of your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:RiskOfBlades.NAME: Risk Of Blades
${ModID}:RiskOfBlades.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害 for each Attack among the top 4 牌 of your 抽牌堆。

${ModID}:Crossroads.NAME: Crossroads
${ModID}:Crossroads.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! 。 NL Play the top card of your 抽牌堆。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Anticipation.NAME: Anticipation
${ModID}:Anticipation.DESCRIPTION: 抽一张牌。 NL 获得 力量 equal to its cost。
${ModID}:Anticipation.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 抽 !M! 张牌。 NL 获得 力量 equal to their cost。

${ModID}:Prediction.NAME: Prediction
${ModID}:Prediction.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL If no enemy intends to attack, 获得 it 下回合 instead。

${ModID}:ForceBolt.NAME: Force Bolt
${ModID}:ForceBolt.DESCRIPTION: *Magic. NL 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Increase the damage dealt by *Magic 牌 by !M! 本回合。

${ModID}:Enigmancy.NAME: Enigmancy
${ModID}:Enigmancy.DESCRIPTION: Scry !M! 。 NL Each turn, 获得 !${ModID}:m2! Energy 并reduce this 获得 by 1。

${ModID}:Recurrence.NAME: Recurrence
${ModID}:Recurrence.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a copy of your h并into your 抽牌堆。 NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:DivineMight.NAME: Divine Might
${ModID}:DivineMight.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL When [#EFC851]Divine [#EFC851]Might is played twice, ${ModID}:Ascend。
